root.name: Baryon
root.description: OverviewBaryon is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up developed by Korean ACRO Studio for the PC. Set in the 22nd century, it has the player piloting a futuristic fighter jet through 6 levels filled with enemies and boss battles at the end. It has the standard features of the genre, like weapons upgradeable by power-ups, and smart-bombs that clear all enemies on screen, and supports local 2-player co-op.
